aws_lb_cookie_stickiness_policy.description: Provides a load balancer cookie stickiness policy, which allows an ELB to control the sticky session lifetime of the browser.

name.description: The name of the stickiness policy.

load_balancer.description: The load balancer to which the policy

lb_port.description: The load balancer port to which the policy

name.description: The name of the stickiness policy.

load_balancer.description: The load balancer to which the policy is attached.

lb_port.description: The load balancer port to which the policy is applied.

cookie_expiration_period.description: The time period after which the session cookie is considered stale, expressed in seconds.
